Name: Lockes The Thief
About the game: Things are about to get busy in this Freshman effort by Padlockes Technologies LLC. Play as Lockes The Thief, who, after receiving a mysterious message in his head, goes on an adventure to betray his old comrades. These comrades, members of his tribe The Sneaks, have betrayed the tribe first and are planning on working with an enemy tribe, The Soldiers, and stealing a magickal energy source, the unRealistic, which would grant them ultimate power to rule over Slabland. Lockes, who is loyal to The Sneak Code, wants no part of this and is tasked with defeating his ex-partners, disabling their extreme plot, and destroying their evil plans. Traverse grassy lands, forests, fortresses and temples. Use your quick hits to defeat your enemy, The Sludge. Use your quick wits to dodge traps and out smart cunning bosses. Sneak and Fight. Collect and Steal Luckie pickups to upgrade your gear. Embrace The Muse, your Sage companion who guides you. Steal for the greater good - and yourself of course. A game that oozes cool and features a black protagonist and is made by a black indie game developer.
